title: Caplin: use tx which been committed or rolled back
body:
Error happened at my branch: 
```
[WARN] [09-28|02:24:43.402] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="invalid state version"
```

But after this error - we seems get into invalid state and print many similar errors:  
```
[INFO] [09-27|14:59:26.388] [Caplin] Epoch downloaded                app=caplin stage=CatchUpEpochs epoch=104409
[WARN] [09-27|22:54:04.557] extra block failed validation            app=caplin stage=ListenForForks err="failed to write block root to beacon_indicies: sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-27|23:09:00.000] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-27|23:09:04.965] extra block failed validation            app=caplin stage=ListenForForks err="failed to write block root to beacon_indicies: sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-27|23:12:12.000] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-27|23:12:16.247] extra block failed validation            app=caplin stage=ListenForForks err="failed to write block root to beacon_indicies: sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-27|23:36:36.000] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-27|23:49:48.000] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|00:08:16.122] extra block failed validation            app=caplin stage=ListenForForks err="failed to write block root to beacon_indicies: sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|00:11:52.188] extra block failed validation            app=caplin stage=ListenForForks err="failed to write block root to beacon_indicies: sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|00:38:00.001] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|00:45:48.001] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|00:53:12.002] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|00:54:24.001] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|00:54:28.563] extra block failed validation            app=caplin stage=ListenForForks err="failed to write block root to beacon_indicies: sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|00:58:28.502] extra block failed validation            app=caplin stage=ListenForForks err="failed to write block root to beacon_indicies: sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|01:00:00.001] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
[WARN] [09-28|01:04:36.001] error executing clstage                  app=caplin stage=CatchUpBlocks err="sql: transaction has already been committed or rolled back"
```
